private_memories.name: Marketing Team Development
private_memories.episode_body: Sarah is excellent at content creation, Tom has strong social media instincts. Planning to expand team with performance marketing specialist in Q2. Focus on building brand awareness and lead generation.

public_memories.name: Rachel Green - Marketing Manager
public_memories.episode_body: Rachel Green is Marketing Manager at TechFlow Solutions, leading the Marketing Team. Expert in marketing strategy, campaign execution, and brand positioning. 6 years marketing experience. Manages Sarah Miller (Content) and Tom Wilson (Social Media).

public_memories.name: Q1 Marketing Campaigns
public_memories.episode_body: Q1 2026 campaigns: 1) Product launch campaign for improved checkout (email, social, blog), 2) Customer success stories (case studies), 3) SEO content strategy (technical blog posts). Goals: 20% increase in organic traffic, 15% improvement in conversion rate.

public_memories.name: Brand Guidelines
public_memories.episode_body: TechFlow brand values: innovative, reliable, customer-focused. Voice: professional but approachable, technical but clear. Visual identity: blue primary color (#007AFF), modern sans-serif typography (Inter), clean minimalist design. Used consistently across website, social media, email.
